user.title: OpenEI (Step 1)
user.description: If you do not have an API Key yet you can get one here: https://openei.org/services/api/signup/

user_3.title: OpenEI (Step 3)
user_3.description: Select your plan from the list. If you are unsure, check your utility bill.
